sentences.en: After a few weeks in Marseille, I grew restless and decided to move on.
sentences.cn: 在马赛住了几星期后，我开始待不住了，决定换个地方。

sentences.en: By 1982, she was restless and needed a new impetus for her talent.
sentences.cn: 到了1982年，她感到厌倦了，需要新的动力来激发她的才能。

sentences.en: Gatsby's foot beat a short , restless tattoo and Tom eyed him suddenly.
sentences.cn: 盖茨比的脚不耐烦地连敲了几声, 引起汤姆突然瞧了他一眼.

sentences.en: He felt restless and dissatisfied as he drove home.
sentences.cn: 在开车回家的途中，他感到烦躁不安，很不高兴。

sentences.en: He looks like a restless man.
Hurt had spent a restless few hours on the plane from Paris.
sentences.cn: 赫特在从巴黎起飞的飞机上辗转反侧了几个小时。

sentences.en: I don't know what is on his mind; he always looks restless.
sentences.cn: 不知他有什么事, 老是心神不定的样子.

sentences.en: It had been a tense, restless day with people crowding her all the time.
sentences.cn: 这是紧张、忙碌的一天，每时每刻都有人围在她身旁。

sentences.en: Marian retains a restless, youthful spirit, in search of new horizons.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安怀着一颗年轻、不断进取的心去寻求新的天地。

sentences.en: The restless child wiggled in his chair.
sentences.cn: 这个一时也不会安静的孩子在椅子上不停地摇动.

sentences.en: The restless students are on the boil again.
sentences.cn: 不安分的学生们又处于激动之中.

sentences.en: The shocking revelations of the 700-page report had caused him several restless nights.
sentences.cn: 这篇长达700页的报告中披露的惊人信息使他几夜未眠。

sentences.en: The sick child passed a restless night.
sentences.cn: 这患病的孩子一夜未眠.

words.tran_cn: 宁静的；安静的；给人休息的
倔强的；难驾御的；不安宁的
休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于

trans.tran_cn: 焦躁不安的，不耐烦的，坐立不安的，难以入睡的
trans.tran_en: unwilling to keep still or stay where you are, especially because you are nervous or bored
